lines.text: Man, with his misdeeds, kindles his own hellfire!
[Zeb holds a gun on the Stoner boys]
You gents get your hands up just a little higher. You're not tired yet.
You can pick up your gun now, friend, but pick it up kinda easy like. I sure hope I didn't nick ya. I didn't aim to draw blood.
For a Bible-toter, you're pretty handy with a six-shooter.
It kinda bothers me, too. Seems like the only kind of sermon I can make folks listen to.
We ain't bad at that kind of sermon ourselves. If you're in town when we get back, we'll see who can be the most convincin'.
First on the draw and first on the jaw, ain't ya!
Doll's real name is Mary Carson.
Then all you want Doll for is to tell where she can find her sister.
I want her so she won't find her sister.
Wait a minute, Bucky, you're stirrin' up too much dust. I don't savvy.
A man never starts killing until he stops thinking.
